58 ToolsInterfaceCore::ToolsInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh, std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface) : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface))
59 {
60  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::ctor");
61 
62  // init tool state with unconnected state
63  _toolState = std::make_shared<ToolState>();
64 
65  init(nh);
66 }
67 
73 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
74 {
75  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::init - Initializing parameters...");
76  initParameters(nh);
77 
78  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
79  startServices(nh);
80 
81  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
82  startPublishers(nh);
83 
84  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
85  startSubscribers(nh);
86 
87  return true;
88 }
89 
95 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::rebootHardware(bool torque_on)
96 {
97  bool res = true;
98  if (_toolState && _toolState->isValid())
99  {
100  // reboot
101  bool res = _ttl_interface->rebootHardware(_toolState);
102 
103  // re init
104  if (res)
105  initHardware(torque_on, _temperature_limit, _shutdown_configuration, _available_tools_map.at(_toolState->getId()));
106  }
107  // else no tool, return ok
108 
109  return res;
110 }
111 
115 int ToolsInterfaceCore::initHardware(bool torque_on, uint8_t temperature_limit, uint8_t shutdown_configuration, const ToolConfig &config)
116 {
117  uint8_t motor_id;
118  if (_toolState)
119  {
120  motor_id = _toolState->getId();
121  if (EHardwareType::XL330 == _toolState->getHardwareType())
122  {
123  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{false}));
124 
125  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
126  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TEMPERATURE_LIMIT, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{temperature_limit}));
127  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
128  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SHUTDOWN, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{shutdown_configuration}));
129 
130  uint8_t control_mode = 5; // torque + position
131  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
132  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CONTROL_MODE, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{control_mode}));
133 
134  _toolState->setPositionPGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(config.params.pid.at("p")));
135  _toolState->setPositionIGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(config.params.pid.at("i")));
136  _toolState->setPositionDGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(config.params.pid.at("d")));
137  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
138  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_PID,
139  motor_id,
140  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{_toolState->getPositionPGain(),
141  _toolState->getPositionIGain(),
142  _toolState->getPositionDGain(),
143  _toolState->getVelocityPGain(),
144  _toolState->getVelocityIGain(),
145  _toolState->getFF1Gain(),
146  _toolState->getFF2Gain()}));
147 
148  _toolState->setVelProfile(config.params.velocity_profile);
149  _toolState->setAccProfile(config.params.acceleration_profile);
150  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
151  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_PROFILE,
152  motor_id,
153  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{_toolState->getVelProfile(),
154  _toolState->getAccProfile()}));
155  }
156  // TORQUE cmd on if ned2, off otherwise
157  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{torque_on}));
158  }
159  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
160 }
161 
166 void ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
167 {
168  double tool_connection_frequency{1.0};
169  nh.getParam("check_tool_connection_frequency", tool_connection_frequency);
170  nh.getParam("vacuum_pump_timeout", _vacuum_pump_timeout);
171  nh.getParam("gripper_timeout", _gripper_timeout);
172 
173 
174  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters - check tool connection frequency : %f", tool_connection_frequency);
175 
176  assert(tool_connection_frequency);
177  _tool_connection_publisher_duration = ros::Duration(1.0 / tool_connection_frequency);
178 
179  std::vector<int> idList;
180  std::vector<string> typeList;
181  std::vector<string> nameList;
182  std::vector<ToolParams> tool_params;
183  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue params_list;
184 
185  _available_tools_map.clear();
186  nh.getParam("tools_params/id_list", idList);
187  nh.getParam("tools_params/type_list", typeList);
188  nh.getParam("tools_params/name_list", nameList);
189  nh.getParam("tools_params/temperature_limit", _temperature_limit);
190  nh.getParam("tools_params/shutdown_configuration", _shutdown_configuration);
191 
192  if (nh.getParam("tools_params/params_list", params_list)) {
193  for (int i = 0; i < params_list.size(); ++i) {
194  ToolParams params;
195  params.velocity_profile = static_cast<int>(params_list[i]["velocity_profile"]);
196  params.acceleration_profile = static_cast<int>(params_list[i]["acceleration_profile"]);
197  params.pid["p"] = static_cast<int>(params_list[i]["pid"]["p"]);
198  params.pid["i"] = static_cast<int>(params_list[i]["pid"]["i"]);
199  params.pid["d"] = static_cast<int>(params_list[i]["pid"]["d"]);
200  tool_params.push_back(params);
201  }
202  }
203 
204  // check that the three lists have the same size
205  if (idList.size() == typeList.size() && idList.size() == nameList.size())
206  {
207  // put everything in maps
208  for (size_t i = 0; i < idList.size(); ++i)
209  {
210  auto id = static_cast<uint8_t>(idList.at(i));
211  EHardwareType type = HardwareTypeEnum(typeList.at(i).c_str());
212  std::string name = nameList.at(i);
213  int velocity_profile = tool_params.at(i).velocity_profile;
214  int acceleration_profile = tool_params.at(i).acceleration_profile;
215  std::map<std::string, uint32_t> pid = tool_params.at(i).pid;
216 
217  if (!_available_tools_map.count(id))
218  {
219  if (EHardwareType::UNKNOWN != type)
220  {
221  auto tool_config = ToolConfig{
222  name,
223  type,
224  ToolParams{
225  velocity_profile,
226  acceleration_profile,
227  pid
228  }
229  };
230 
231  _available_tools_map.insert(std::make_pair(id, tool_config));
232  }
233  else
234  ROS_ERROR("ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters - unknown type %s. "
235  "Please check your configuration file (tools_interface/config/default.yaml)",
236  typeList.at(id).c_str());
237  }
238  else
239  ROS_ERROR("ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters - duplicate id %d. "
240  "Please check your configuration file (tools_interface/config/default.yaml)",
241  id);
242  }
243  }
244  else
245  {
246  ROS_ERROR("ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters - wrong dynamixel configuration. "
247  "Please check your configuration file (tools_interface/config/default.yaml)");
248  }
249 
250  for (auto const &tool : _available_tools_map)
251  {
252  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::initParameters - Available tools map: %d => %s (%s)", static_cast<int>(tool.first), tool.second.name.c_str(),
253  HardwareTypeEnum(tool.second.type).toString().c_str());
254  }
255 }
256 
261 void ToolsInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
262 {
263  _ping_and_set_dxl_tool_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/ping_and_set_dxl_tool", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetTool, this);
264 
265  _open_gripper_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/open_gripper", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackOpenGripper, this);
266 
267  _close_gripper_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/close_gripper", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackCloseGripper, this);
268 
269  _pull_air_vacuum_pump_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/pull_air_vacuum_pump", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPullAirVacuumPump, this);
270 
271  _push_air_vacuum_pump_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/push_air_vacuum_pump", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPushAirVacuumPump, this);
272 
273  _tool_reboot_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/tools/reboot", &ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackToolReboot, this);
274 }
275 
280 void ToolsInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
281 {
282  _tool_connection_publisher = nh.advertise<tools_interface::Tool>("/niryo_robot_hardware/tools/motor", 1, true);
283 
284  _tool_connection_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_tool_connection_publisher_duration, &ToolsInterfaceCore::_publishToolConnection, this);
285 }
286 
291 void ToolsInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle & /*nh*/) { ROS_DEBUG("No subscribers to start"); }
292 
297 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::isInitialized() { return !_available_tools_map.empty(); }
298 
304 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetTool(tools_interface::PingDxlTool::Request & /*req*/, tools_interface::PingDxlTool::Response &res)
305 {
306  res.tool.id = -1;
307  res.tool.motor_type = Tool::NO_MOTOR;
308 
309  res.tool.position = 0;
310  res.tool.state = ToolState::TOOL_STATE_PING_ERROR;
311 
312  res.state = res.tool.state;
313 
314  std::lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
315  // Unequip tool
316  if (_toolState && _toolState->isValid())
317  {
318  // unmanage tool
319  _ttl_interface->unsetTool(_toolState->getId());
320 
321  // reset tool state as default = no tool
322  _toolState->reset();
323  }
324 
325  // Search new tool
326  std::vector<uint8_t> motor_list = _ttl_interface->scanTools();
327 
328  for (auto const &m_id : motor_list)
329  {
330  if (_available_tools_map.count(m_id))
331  {
332  // reset tool state
333  _toolState = std::make_shared<ToolState>(_available_tools_map.at(m_id).name, _available_tools_map.at(m_id).type, m_id);
334  break;
335  }
336  }
337 
338  // if new tool has been found
339  if (_toolState)
340  {
341  if (_toolState->isValid())
342  {
343  // Try 3 times
344  for (int tries = 0; tries < 3; tries++)
345  {
346  int result = _ttl_interface->setTool(_toolState);
347 
348  // on success, tool is set, we initialize it and go out of loop
349  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result &&
350  niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == initHardware(true, _temperature_limit, _shutdown_configuration, _available_tools_map.at(_toolState->getId())))
351  {
352  _toolState->setState(ToolState::TOOL_STATE_PING_OK);
353 
354  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
355  ROS_INFO("ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetDxlTool - Set tool success !");
356 
357  break;
358  }
359 
360  ROS_WARN("ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetDxlTool - "
361  "Set tool failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
362  result, tries);
363  }
364 
365  // on failure after three tries
366  if (ToolState::TOOL_STATE_PING_OK != _toolState->getState())
367  {
368  ROS_ERROR("ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetDxlTool - Fail to set tool, return : %d", _toolState->getState());
369 
370  // reset toolstate to indicate that it is not usable
371  _toolState->reset();
372 
373  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
374  }
375  }
376  else // no tool found, no tool set (it is not an error, the tool does not exists)
377  {
378  _toolState->setState(ToolState::TOOL_STATE_PING_OK);
379 
380  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
381  }
382 
383  res.state = _toolState->getState();
384  }
385 
386  return true;
387 }
388 
394 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackToolReboot(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
395 {
396  bool success = false;
397 
398  if (_toolState && _toolState->isValid())
399  {
400  success = rebootHardware(true);
401  res.status = (success) ? niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS : niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TOOL_FAILURE;
402  res.message = (success) ? "Tool reboot succeeded" : "Tool reboot failed";
403  }
404  else
405  {
406  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
407  res.message = "No Tool";
408  }
409 
410  return true;
411 }
412 
419 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackOpenGripper(tools_interface::ToolCommand::Request &req, tools_interface::ToolCommand::Response &res)
420 {
421  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
422  res.state = ToolState::TOOL_STATE_WRONG_ID;
423 
424  if (_toolState && _toolState->isValid() && req.id == _toolState->getId())
425  {
426  _toolCommand(req.position, req.max_torque, req.speed);
427 
428  _waitForToolStop(req.id, _gripper_timeout);
429 
430  // set hold torque
431  _toolCommand(_toolState->getPosition(), req.hold_torque, req.speed);
432 
433  _toolState->setState(ToolState::GRIPPER_STATE_OPEN);
434 
435  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackOpenGripper : Opened !");
436  res.state = _toolState->getState();
437  }
438 
439  return true;
440 }
441 
448 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackCloseGripper(tools_interface::ToolCommand::Request &req, tools_interface::ToolCommand::Response &res)
449 {
450  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
451  res.state = ToolState::TOOL_STATE_WRONG_ID;
452 
453  if (_toolState && _toolState->isValid() && req.id == _toolState->getId())
454  {
455  uint32_t position_command = (req.position < 50) ? 0 : req.position - 50;
456 
457  _toolCommand(position_command, req.max_torque, req.speed);
458 
459  _waitForToolStop(req.id, _gripper_timeout);
460 
461  // set hold torque
462  _toolCommand(_toolState->getPosition(), req.hold_torque, req.speed);
463 
464  _toolState->setState(ToolState::GRIPPER_STATE_CLOSE);
465  ROS_DEBUG("Closed !");
466 
467  res.state = _toolState->getState();
468  }
469 
470  return true;
471 }
472 
479 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPullAirVacuumPump(tools_interface::ToolCommand::Request &req, tools_interface::ToolCommand::Response &res)
480 {
481  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
482  res.state = ToolState::TOOL_STATE_WRONG_ID;
483 
484  // check gripper id, in case no ping has been done before, or wrong id given
485  if (_toolState)
486  {
487  if (_toolState->isValid() && req.id == _toolState->getId())
488  {
489  // to be put in tool state
490  auto pull_air_velocity = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.speed);
491  auto pull_air_position = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.position);
492  int pull_air_hold_torque = req.hold_torque;
493  int pull_air_max_torque = req.max_torque;
494  // set vacuum pump pos, vel and torque
495  if (_ttl_interface)
496  {
497  _toolCommand(pull_air_position, pull_air_max_torque, pull_air_velocity);
498 
499  _waitForToolStop(req.id, _vacuum_pump_timeout);
500 
501  // set hold torque
502  _toolCommand(_toolState->getPosition(), pull_air_hold_torque, pull_air_velocity);
503 
504  _toolState->setState(ToolState::VACUUM_PUMP_STATE_PULLED);
505  }
506  }
507  res.state = _toolState->getState();
508  }
509 
510  return true;
511 }
512 
519 bool ToolsInterfaceCore::_callbackPushAirVacuumPump(tools_interface::ToolCommand::Request &req, tools_interface::ToolCommand::Response &res)
520 {
521  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
522  res.state = ToolState::TOOL_STATE_WRONG_ID;
523 
524  // check gripper id, in case no ping has been done before, or wrong id given
525  if (_toolState)
526  {
527  if (_toolState->isValid() && req.id == _toolState->getId())
528  {
529  // to be defined in the toolstate
530  auto push_air_velocity = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.speed);
531  auto push_air_position = static_cast<uint32_t>(req.position);
532 
533  // set vacuum pump pos, vel and torque
534  if (_ttl_interface)
535  {
536  _toolCommand(push_air_position, req.max_torque, push_air_velocity);
537 
538  _waitForToolStop(req.id, _vacuum_pump_timeout);
539 
540  // set torque to 0
541  _toolCommand(_toolState->getPosition(), 0, push_air_velocity);
542 
543  _toolState->setState(ToolState::VACUUM_PUMP_STATE_PUSHED);
544  }
545  }
546  res.state = _toolState->getState();
547  }
548 
549  return true;
550 }
551 
557 void ToolsInterfaceCore::_waitForToolStop(int id, int timeout)
558 {
559  // Wait for moving status to acknowledge that the motion has stopped or return if timeout
560  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point start_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
561  int moving_counter{10};
562 
563  while (std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::seconds>(std::chrono::steady_clock::now() - start_time).count() < timeout)
564  {
565  uint8_t moving_status;
566  _ttl_interface->readMoving(id, moving_status);
567 
568  // Count the number of times the tool has been detected as not moving consecutively
569  if (moving_status == 0)
570  {
571  moving_counter--;
572  }
573  else
574  {
575  moving_counter = 10;
576  }
577 
578  // If the tool has been detected as not moving 10 times in a row, we consider that the vacuum pump cannot move anymore
579  if (moving_counter <= 0)
580  {
581  break;
582  }
583 
584  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(50));
585  }
586 }
587 
595 void ToolsInterfaceCore::_toolCommand(uint32_t position, int torque, uint32_t velocity)
596 {
597  uint8_t tool_id = _toolState->getId();
598  EHardwareType tool_motor_type = _toolState->getHardwareType();
599 
600  if (EHardwareType::XL320 == tool_motor_type)
601  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY, tool_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{velocity}));
602 
603  // need to set max torque. It makes cmd changing speed take effect
604  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
605  std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_EFFORT, tool_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{static_cast<uint16_t>(torque)}));
606 
607  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION, tool_id, std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{position}));
608 }
609 
613 void ToolsInterfaceCore::_publishToolConnection(const ros::TimerEvent &)
614 {
615  lock_guard<mutex> lck(_tool_mutex);
616 
617  ROS_DEBUG("ToolsInterfaceCore::_publishToolConnection : publishing");
618 
619  tools_interface::Tool msg;
620 
621  if (_toolState)
622  {
623  // check that current managed tool is still connected
624  if (_toolState->isValid())
625  {
626  if (_ttl_interface && !_ttl_interface->scanMotorId(_toolState->getId()))
627  {
628  // try 3 times to ping tool, ttl failed to ping tool sometimes
629  if (3 == _tool_ping_failed_cnt)
630  {
631  ROS_INFO("Tools Interface - Unset Current Tools");
632  _ttl_interface->unsetTool(_toolState->getId());
633 
634  // reset state
635  _toolState->reset();
636  _tool_ping_failed_cnt = 0;
637  }
638  else
639  _tool_ping_failed_cnt++;
640  }
641  else
642  {
643  _tool_ping_failed_cnt = 0;
644  }
645  }
646 
647  // publish message
648 
649  int id = _toolState->getId();
650  EHardwareType motor_type = _toolState->getHardwareType();
651 
652  msg.id = static_cast<int8_t>(id);
653  msg.position = _toolState->getPosition();
654  msg.state = _toolState->getState();
655 
656  switch (motor_type)
657  {
658  case EHardwareType::STEPPER:
659  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::STEPPER;
660  break;
661  case EHardwareType::XL430:
662  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::XL430;
663  break;
664  case EHardwareType::XC430:
665  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::XC430;
666  break;
667  case EHardwareType::XM430:
668  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::XM430;
669  break;
670  case EHardwareType::XL320:
671  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::XL320;
672  break;
673  case EHardwareType::XL330:
674  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::XL330;
675  break;
676  case EHardwareType::FAKE_DXL_MOTOR:
677  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::FAKE_DXL_MOTOR;
678  break;
679  case EHardwareType::FAKE_STEPPER_MOTOR:
680  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::STEPPER;
681  break;
682  default:
683  msg.motor_type = tools_interface::Tool::NO_MOTOR;
684  break;
685  }
686  }
687 
688  _tool_connection_publisher.publish(msg);
689 }
690 } // namespace tools_interface

ros::ServiceServer _tool_reboot_server
Definition: tools_interface_core.hpp:128

Definition: tools_interface_core.hpp:45
tools_interface::ToolsInterfaceCore::ToolConfig::params
ToolParams params
Definition: tools_interface_core.hpp:85
